mapper.insert: insert into clients(client_id, name, password, email, birthday, phone, address, address_detail, zip_code, privacy_terms, email_check, activation_check, qualified_check, profile_url, email_auth, social_type, social_id) values (#{clientId}, #{name}, #{password},#{email}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zipCode},#{privacyTerms},#{emailCheck},#{activationCheck},#{qualifiedCheck}, #{profileURL},#{emailAuth},#{socialType},#{socialId})
mapper.select: select * from CLIENTS where client_id=#{clientId} and password = #{password}
